attributes.action: Stop britans being ripped off by Blu Ray makers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With Blu Ray wining the HiDef DVD war, its time the government stepped in to stop UK citizens from being ripped off once again by US to UK pricing. In the UK the average price of a new bluray disk is around £22, while in the US its around $25! Why oh WHY Must UK citizens be forced to accept these huge increases in price particually with the dollar so low. With a world wide market its high time prices were based on normal economics and not some executives greed.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
